Gosh folks, I didn't mean to start a debate. I just wanted to share what I =
got from the prison. I think that the box technology is fantastic. Almost b=
eyond belief. I am not scientifically savvy as to how and why this technolo=
gy works, I just know that it does. I used to be a box skeptic, then someon=
e gave me one almost a year ago. I=A0conducted various experiments with it =
trying to determine if it produced random replys or intelligent, relivant c=
onversation. I have determined through my experiments that it produces the =
latter. I have since used it on many investigations, historical and residen=
tial. It has never failed me. Here is a link to one of my first experiments=
 with my box, "Can Spirits See US?" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3D-yyb2B=
YuRso

Steve

Yes-we do at times need to work with other people to get what =
we want, but it is still up to us to make the right decisions for the good =
of ourselves, and do want we need to do to get where we need to go. We shou=
ld not expect or ask other people to forsake themselves to give us a free o=
r easy ride.
=A0

April, realistically, I could not do it alone, not at my age, wi=
th the obligations and conditions, =A0I have lived with, maybe a teenager c=
ould survive, without food and sleep 3 or 4 days, without help,=A0but even =
then they would look for help some where, we all need each other, this is n=
ot a deserted Island, we live for our selves and for each other.sf
